EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Cloud Native Workshops_Q216.Confirmation - Houston
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/st-louis]]> Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud Native Workshop in Houston. See event details below:
Date: June 2, 2016 Time: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM Location: Houston Marriott West Loop by The Galleria, 1750 West Loop South, Houston, TX 77027
{{my.Save the Date Houston}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/houston]]>.
